dialogues.NARRATOR'S VOICE:
[1]And so the eyes of the entire nation are now focused upon Governor Willie Stark, an amazing phenomenon on the American political scene. [5]He still keeps in touch with these people of the backwoods, making periodic trips to such places as Kanoma City, now famous as his birthplace...

[8]...and from the looks of things, he is here to stay. Willie Stark: messiah or dictator?
